data.name: The Piano That Stops Time (Free)
data.detailed_description:
The Piano That Stops Time is an emotional visual novel. Follow the story of the male protagonist who could not play the piano without sheet music, and meets 'Yerin', a girl who can play the play the piano at will.

Synopsis

I met Yerin, who can play the piano freely without sheet music, unlike me. One day, she brought up a story about a piano that stops time...

Features

  • ±1 hour of gameplay
  • Full voiceover for heroine and 1 supporting character
  • Beautiful soundtrack produced by the developer himself

data.short_description: The Piano That Stops Time is an emotional visual novel. Follow the story of the male protagonist who could not play the piano without sheet music, and meets 'Yerin', a girl who can play the play the piano at will.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 1.1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 1.1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This software has not yet been notarized by Apple.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 1.1 GB available space
